saao/saa15/P313470
a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia ARAD-ka {1}aš-šur-EN-PAB lu DI-mu a-na LUGAL EN-ia {LU₂}ARAD-MEŠ ša LUGAL EN-ia ša x x x ih-ta-al-qu TA x x x x x ša {1}lu-tu-u₂ ina x x x x kam-mu-su a-na {1}lu-tu-u₂-ma a-sap-ra mu-uk {LU₂}par-ri-ṣu-te di-ni ma-a al-ka at-ta ana-ku ni-li-ki nu-še-ṣi-a TA pa-an LUGAL pa-lah₃-ku mi-nu ša LUGAL EN-li i-qa-bu-u-ni ina UGU {ŠE}tab-ku ša E₂ {LU₂}GAL-u₂-ra-te {LU₂}GAL-u₂-ra-te ša LUGAL EN iš-pur-an-ni ma-a tu-ub-ta-di-id x x x x te-ta-li-ia pa-an LUGAL x x x x-ku is-si-šu-nu x x x x x šum₂-mu {DUG}qa-bu-tu₂ x x x x x+x {1}{d}UTU-EN-PAB x x x x x x lu-bal-liṭ-ni x x x x x ša {LU₂}x am-mar x x x x x x x KUR-šu₂-ni x x x x x x x-u₂ x x x x x x x-an-ni x x x x x x x te-pa-aš₂ x x x x x x x x+x KUG.UD ina ŠA₃-bi la ša UD.KA.BAR x x x-a-te LUGAL liš-al x+x x x x ha-bu-li ša x x x x x+x lu-šal-lim-me u x x x x x ša {1}IGI.2-MEŠ-DINGIR x x x x x 20 ša du x x x x x
